content.description:
Start in the back left side of the boulder that is to the right of locked loaded. Move into a hand jam between the boulder you started on and the boulder that has locked and a loaded. Top out on locked and loaded. 

  Yes.... It is contrived....
content.location: Across the wash from the Africa boulder.

content.description: Traverse left to crimps and pocket, through overhang and up bulge to top out.
content.location: Standing start next to Snap crackle Pop

content.description: Sit start to Mini Slashface. Start on obvious left hand jug and right hand rail. Climb right of the arete and make your way into the start of Mini Slashface.
content.location: Boulder located across the wash from the World Boulder area.

content.description: THis boulder starts on the obvious flake on the left side of the Africa Boulder. It comes out the bulge and up.
content.location: Left side of the Africa boulder.

content.description: Mini Slashface is a short powerful route starting in the middle of the boulder on a decent crimp rail and shooting out right.
content.location: Boulder is located directly across the wash from World Boulder area and before Africa Boulder main. Noticeable north facing boulder.

content.description: Sit start of right side of boulder. Pop up to a bad sidepull (crux). Move up and left to top out.
content.protection: Pad and Spotters due to a large boulder in the landing of the top out.
content.location: Directly across the wash from the Africa boulder.

content.description: This is in the bottom of the wash. Sit start and pull through overhang. Top out.
content.location: This down hill from Main Attraction (V4). It is also about 100 yards down hill from the Africa Boulder.

content.description: Right side variation of "Out of Africa"

climbs.name: Clamor and Filth of the Cultural Apparatus

content.description: Contrived climbing on the underside of a rock, so close to the ground you can touch it for nearly the entire climb, safe enough that the only things in real danger are your pitifully weak tendons and your fragile ego, radical enough for your Instagram followers, this conventional boulder was made for the conventional boulderer. Don’t worry fellow crusties, this one only clocks in at V3. Start this paradox as far deep inside the cave as your standing height allows. I found the easiest way to start is with a left arm chicken wing and tossing my legs in horizontally. From here, traverse your way out of the off-width cave roof and top out the classic nondescript summit. All features but the ground are on.
content.location: Located on the left (west) side of the Africa Boulder. Start in the crack deep inside of the cave formed between the slab and the boulder.

content.description: Sit start and follow good holds to top. Top out is somewhat crumbly
This area is right below the amphitheatre. It contains a few fun moderates and a few easy routes. There are commonly bees at the base of the Africa boulder and it is worse after rain.
